reviews.text: Great company, I highly recommend them! Easy to communicate with, someone always answers the phone! Makes owning a pool easy! And the technicians are courteous and always make sure gates are closed and text me before they get here to make sure the dogs aren't out!
We recently purchased the home with the pool and my family who lives in the area recommended them to me. They have been excellent, teaching us as they take care of the pool.

Patriot Pool & Spa
My pool technician Colton ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
is the best!
He keeps my pool looking awesome from week to week! 🙌☀️⛱️
He along with Blake ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ are truly exceptional! I simply could not be more pleased with their customer service!! Thank you!

Brandon did such a good job at getting our pool in our new home in tiptop shape for us to enjoy as soon as we moved in! He was Very knowledgeable and spent nearly 6 hours at our home making sure that our pool is ready to go when we Moved in! We’re so glad we picked Patriot, pool and spa for our pool needs!

Every staff member is friendly and easy to work with. Office staff to repairman. Grant is our weekly maintenance guy. He is the best.Brandon came out today and put a new pump on. He was very professional and knowledgeable. Thank you Brandon

Absolutely amazing work by Brandon (once again!). Brandon from Patriot Pools is a Godsend. He’s cleaned the filters, replaced the regulator on the gas heater line, and installed a replacement salt cell for me. He’s fast, knowledgeable, and will always suggest the most effective, low-cost alternative if funds are tight. When he says I could save money by installing an upgraded variable speed pump, I know I’m not being upsold.

Can’t recommend enough!!

Had to replace my pool pump called multiple pool services and I am so happy I went with Patriot Pool! Clint was professional, knowledgeable and helpful! I have an amazing pump system I can run through my phone! Thank you Clint and Patriot Pool! 😊 …

Excellent weekly service for years with Brandon! Feel fortunate to have him. Love the weekly photos of every part of service
Pricey service but reliable and peace of mind
I have used many different companies to take care of my pool in the past, but no one has came close to taking care of it the way this team does! Thank you Nathan and team.

Patriot pools helped me out making may fixes on our pool in a short amount of time and taking over the cleaning as well.  The prices were reasonable. Everyone I have worked with has been punctual, polite and respectful.  I couldn’t be happier.

Water feature was not working, so I called the repair dept on Saturday. Josh answered and was great! He looked up our equipment and was able to tell us how to fix the valve setting. All good now, thanks to Josh!

Patriot Pools is always on top of cleaning and repairing my pool.  Jordan comes weekly and catches things before they are a problem. Brandon is always available to help in an emergency or to install or Repair equipment.  I’m able to reach them after hours in an emergency, and they are always there to answer questions.

Patriot Pools has not only been a great pool service for our maintenance and cleaning, but we are truly treated like valuable customers. From the office personnel to the techs, nothing but class and great service. Jesse, our pool tech, recently had to clean the pool after a huge storm and wind gusts blew a ton of leaves into the pool. I meant to clean out the baskets but had early work meetings.
He made it spotless again, didn’t complain (even though he had every right to), and he even picked up

Brandon was absolutely amazing. He came here had a lot of knowledge and Fixed what I thought was going cost me a lot of money and was a simple fix.  Will be calling them in the future for all calls and Pool issues

Excellent service. Very knowledgeable and fairly priced. I was previously using another pool service company, however I had some issues with equipment repairs being needed. I understand trouble shooting these things can be tricky, which my prior pool company struggled with. However Van and Nathan came out from Patriot Pools and were able to identify the issue within minutes. The price of the repairs/service was very fair, and they completed the job the next day. They went above and beyond and ed

Patriot Pools always notifies me when they are on their way to my home, and also provides me with a detailed report, including photographs, when they are finished. My technicians are always friendly and helpful and answer all of my questions and concerns. On the rare occasion that something goes wrong, the office is very responsive and sends someone out to address the problem promptly. I highly recommend Patriot Pools for pool service.

Patriot pools has been cleaning our pool for almost ten years.   They always do an excellent job and address any concerns we may have.  Ethan has been cleaning our pool for a while and he does a great job!!  He is always friendly and helpful if I have any questions.  If he sees any issues with the pool or the equipment, he lets us know immediately.  The pool always looks great when he is done!

We have been using Patriot pools for over 5 years now and we couldn’t be happier, our pool always looks great and they got the best client service and technicians. Whatever problem we’ve had they’ve fix it right away. They are very quick to respond to any emails or a calls when we need them, so happy we found them.

Patriot Pool & Spa is exceptional! Patrick handles our weekly maintenance, and his work is outstanding. They document the pool and equipment with before and after photos, compiling everything into a detailed report that's sent following each visit. It's fantastic to receive comprehensive updates on the pool's condition and the maintenance performed. My experience with their service, especially Patrick's, has been wonderful.

Whenever I reach out to their office, I'm promptly connected with a fri

We bought our new house just 6 month ago and our pool quickly turned deep green. We tried to save it ourselves but couldn’t. We got quotes from multiple places and Patriot was most reasonably priced so we went with them. Once Blake A. and his crew from Patriot Pool took over, they turned our pool crystal clear just in 4 days and I called it a miracle. It was amazing and couldn’t be happier than what they have done! Ever since, our pool is always clean and I am happy with their services :)

We have had a great experience with Patriot pool and spa. Everyone has been so knowledgeable and helpful.  Brandon replaced our old pool pump, and took the time to explain how all of the equipment works. Daniel comes once a week to clean our pool and always does a great job. He is always willing to take extra time to make sure everything is perfect and the the pool is in top shape. Highly recommended!

Professional and very friendly service, great communication, and the pool repairs were done on time. The service techs even followed up with us to make sure our pool was still up and running after the repairs. They even provided video clips for us with detailed explanation!

I highly recommend Patriot Pool and Spa. Kudos to Jeff and Brandon for being so helpful and professional!

We have used Patriot Pool and Spa for many many years to take care of our pool and it is always sparkling clean after Kaleb, our technician, leaves. We feel confident that Kaleb and all the staff at Patriot Pool and Spa will take care of any maintenance issues we have with our pool, and also perform regular maintenance (cleaning filters, etc) without us having to worry about it. They always bring things to our attention and are great at fixing any problems. Highly recommend this company if you w
Colton does a great job with our pool! Super friendly and knowledgeable.
A+++++.  They are outstanding !   Our pool looks so much better.    Super friendly as well.    Highly recommended.

Have really enjoyed working with Patriot Pool & Spa on our pool care. Everyone we’ve worked with has been extremely knowledgeable and professional - particularly Van and Blake A. They listened to all our questions and concerns and have addressed them. Very thorough and meticulous in their approach and work. Great to see a business like this and professionals like Van and Blake!
Brandon was so pleasant, knowledgeable and answered all of my questions. Highly recommend them for any pool repair..

Moved to another pool service to save on the monthly cost and we returned to Patriot Pools!
Our tech, Thad, is always friendly, patient with my pool inquiries and thorough on the weekly maintenance. When the pool sweep disappeared one week after service, I reviewed our weekly service report and found Thad noted the pool sweep was taken in for service. His attention to detail, leaving the sweeper hose neatly rolled out of site, was impressive.
The level of service and proactive communication Patr

I've been using Patriot Pool for a few years now. They are a dependable service with great communication. Patrick has done an outstanding job maintaining my pool and has gone the extra mile to make sure the equipment is working properly. He has also taken the time to explain how the spa heater works!

I have used Patriot Pool & Spa for 2 years and they have always provided me impeccable service.   Anytime I have a question or concern they respond immediately.   I find them to be highly dependable and responsive.  Most importantly my pool and spa are always clean and safe to swim in.   Brittany is our Pool Technician and she is fabulous.  When the weather is bad and I have concerns I can call their after hours tech line and I they respond right away to answer my questions.

What I love the mos

Patriot does a great job with our pool. It is well-maintained and seasonal treatments are handled with little fuss on our part. Equipment repairs are done quickly. Our technician, Patrick comes once a week and has done a good job over the past few years he has been with us!

We have a 20+ year old (obsolete) pool heater that went out almost 2 years ago. We don’t have the budget to replace it, so I called a few repair companies but each one said it’s unfixable and needs replacing… then I found Patriot Pool and Spa; their service supervisor Jeff diagnosed the problems and personally sought out and located many discontinued parts, then installed them himself. Now the heater works as it should, at a fraction of what a new heater would cost!!

My experience with Patriot

Brandon with Patriot Pool and Spa was helpful, knowledgeable, and friendly. He was also very timely and responded the day that I called in. My pump had gone out and was smoking, and within a few hours, he was at my house trying to diagnose the problem. He recommended a new variable speed pump and I couldn’t be happier with his installation and consistent communication since that time. I will definitely recommend Patriot Pool & Spa to my friends and family!

We are going into our 3rd season with Patriot Pool and they may be the best service contractor we’ve  ever had. Matt is our technician and that guy really gets it. He treats our pool like it’s his pool, you can tell he cares about his work. They have done minor repairs for us and their pricing is fair and the work was completed quickly. They are a fantastic company to do business with.

Patriot pools has literally saved our pool! Unfortunately over the summer we had a very bad experience with a pool contractor who installed our pool. After leaving us high & dry with multiple issues, we hired patriot pools. They started by getting our chemical levels correct and went above any beyond to make sure they figured out what was wrong. After that, one of the techs came out and fixed multiple issues we had with the electrical and the install of our equipment. I am especially appreciativ

Always great customer service! Their expertise with pools and pool equipment is worthy of my continued trust in Patriot Pools.
Very grateful! Highly recommend!

Patriot Pools does an excellent job in both cleaning and maintaining the pool equipment.  They respond promptly and are always very polite and professional.  Ethan does the weekly cleaning and he’s always timely and thorough.  Brandon, the maintenance tech, is also exceptional.  I highly recommend PP.

Blake has been absolutely fantastic to work with. He’s always been such a great help with making sure my pool is well taken care of. He’s super responsive and manages his team well. We’ve also been very pleased with our technician, Isaac, with maintaining our pool on a weekly basis.

I called Patriot to help fix a leak and they came out quickly.  Brandon let me know he was on his way and was able to quickly find the leak and get it repaired in no time.  Brandon is very knowledgeable and happily answered other questions I had.  I appreciated that and will call again when I need anything else.  Thanks again and highly recommend them to anyone in need!

Adequate pool cleaning services.  However, they will bill you on a regular basis for chemical treatment to bring the water to a perfect state.  It becomes very expensive very quickly.

Poor pool repair capabilities.  Unresponsive management.  If you have issues that require repairs, you will need to find a different provider.

I have been with Pacific/Patriot for 12 years.

They are like family.  My Tech, Thad does a great job on weekly service.  Mike has been doing my equipment maintenance and installed a new heater and pump over the years.  Andrew does a great job with my filter cleaning.

I knew Raquel “when”. Will leave it at that.

Wonderful team.  I could not ask for a better partner in caring for my pool. I am “way too cute” to care for a pool” and they get it.

Fred Wagner.
Colleyville

I have been using Pacific Pools for the past 2 years and I have been consistently impressed with their service, specially by our current technician Brittany.  She always arrives on time and is thorough in cleaning my pool, leaving it sparkling clean and ready for use. Not only she is efficient and professional, but she also takes the time to answer any questions I have about maintaining my pool. I appreciate her attention to detail and her commitment to ensuring that my pool is always in the bes
Colton has done a wonderful job keeping our pool crystal clear, great service

Patriot Pool & Spa has been our weekly pool service provider for years. Blake A. is our tech. He’s GREAT! Always friendly, reliable and trustworthy. It’s important to me to know and trust who is in my backyard. Our pool always look sparkly clean.

I have had numerous pool vendors over the years for all of my properties and Patriot pools and their team are outstanding.  Blake is definitely one of the weekly techs you want servicing/cleaning your pool.  His professionalism and attention to detail is top notch.

Craig Badger

Truly an amazing company filled with very professional, friendly and hard working people at every level. Their pool maintenance service is outstanding and all our pool equipment upgrades or repairs have been performed perfectly & on time.  Tristin, our pool tech, is simply the best!  He does a fantastic job every week along with being so friendly and kind.  I honestly can't say enough good things about this company ... they are like family, just wonderful and I highly recommend!!

Our pool technician, Jaqwan Wright, does such a great job with our pool.  He is very friendly, dependable, communicates everything he is doing, and is very patient with our 2 energetic dogs that are sometimes outside when he comes. We have been using patriot pool and spa for about four months now, and we are very happy with their service!

We researched and called Patriot Pool & Spa because after we took off our winter pool cover, our pool was in bad shape. Blake from Patriot came out the same day we called. He was very  knowledgeable and solved our pool issue that day. It was a huge relief to know our pool will be swim ready! After many years of trying to maintain the pool ourselves we feel confident in turning that task over to Patriot Pool & Spa. We would highly recommend them and their entire team.

Patriot Pool and Spa company is very responsible, friendly, and professional. Our pool tech, Ethan, replicates the company completely. He is very responsive and takes care of issues immediately and does requests consistently (i.e. putting our pool vacuum in our swim lane).  I highly recommend Patriot Pool as your pool care company.

Reached out to Patriot Pool & Spa about issues with my pump. Raquel was super friendly and had a tech out to us in under 2 hours. Brandon was able to troubleshoot my pump and stuck around to answer all my questions about other pool related functions. Would highly recommend Brandon and Patriot Pool & Spa.
